job.name: Send_Results_By_Email
job.description: A task that will send direct parent tasks results by email.

task.name: send_results_by_email
task.description:
A task that will send direct parent tasks results and logs by email. Simply append this task as child to an existing task that produces results. If both "includeTasksResults" and "includeTasksLogs" are false or if there are no results, no email will be sent.
Sending an email requires to configure a SMTP connection. Please look at the following link for the configuration: http://doc.activeeon.com/latest/admin/ProActiveAdminGuide.html#_email_notification

variable.name: includeTasksResults
variable.description: If true, direct parent tasks results will be attached to the email

variable.name: includeTasksLogs
variable.description: If true, direct parent tasks logs will be attached to the email
